description: This simple and quick meatball stew is hearty and filling for an easy midweek dinner with leftovers for lunch.
keywords: Beef stew,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Italian Meatball Stew Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the potatoes in a pan of boiling water for 8 minutes and drain. Heat the oil in a large, deep pan and cook the onions for 5 minutes. Add the garlic and oregano and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the meatballs to the pan and cook for 5 minutes, until browned. Pour in the passata and cook for 5 minutes.
Tip in the potatoes and peas, cook for 1-2 minutes and serve with parmesan on top.
